titles.title: Reaffirming the Universal Declaration of Human Rights and expressing support for "Universal Declaration of Human Rights Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Introduced. Reaffirms the Universal Declaration of Human Rights (adopted by the United Nations on December 10, 1948) and expresses support for Universal Declaration of Human Rights Day.
